title: Caper and tomato yiachni
ingredients: ['100ml Odysea® extra virgin olive oil', '500g pearl onions, peeled and left whole', '6 garlic cloves, peeled', '1 medium cinnamon stick', '1 (330g) jar Odysea® tomato perasti', '100g capers, drained and rinsed well', 'sea salt, to taste', 'chopped fresh thyme, to garnish']
